description.content: Blue Sea - Safety and Hygiene Measures
Catalonia - Global Commitment to Safeguard our guests
All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
All inclusive with alcoholic drinks top brands
No hen/stag or any other parties allowed
Blue Diamond Resorts - Enhanced Health, Safety & Cleanliness Protocols
Children share the bed with parents
Towels and bed linen at surcharge
Marriage certificate required for a couple to share room
Children get free accommodation, meals payable on the spot
Credit card is compulsory as a deposit, no deposit in cash is accepted
Green Key – Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)
Hostelling International’s Quality and Sustainability Standard
NEPCon Sustainable Tourism Certification for Accommodations
Hyatt - GBAC STAR Global Care & Cleanliness Commitment
TOFTigers Initiative’s Pug mark Eco Certification
